ygData.subject: RE: DoT/DD/Hymn equations
ygData.msgSnippet: Hymn is 1hp+1hp/6lvls sung, double that with lute Bellow does 1+lvl/2 rounded down Don t recall CoD or DDD off-hand Kitasi ... From: B. Bedford
ygData.messageBody:
Hymn is 1hp+1hp/6lvls sung, double that with lute
Bellow does 1+lvl/2 rounded down
Don't recall CoD or DDD off-hand

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: B. Bedford [mailto:bbedford@...]
Sent: Friday, November 19, 1999 2:14 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] DoT/DD/Hymn equations


Anyone have the equations for these 3 songs available off hand? Like, how
much damage CoD or DDD do per round per level, or the equation for Bellow?
Hymn would be nice also =)

Taluvil
